dresses.editorial: Look absolutely stunning in this designer couture inspired strapless dress! The strapless dress features a princess rounded off top to fit your bust securely.  The dress features durable yet flexible nylon bands that support the in-seams on the front and back of the dress.  The fabric of this dress has a great taffeta appeal quality and is very luxurious.  The bubble style fully lined pick-up skirt features designs of pleats and shirring.  The padded fully lined bra enhances your cleavage and provides maximum support.  On the front of the dress two in-seams from the left and right bust run down to the waist line. On the back of the dress two in-seams run down in-between the side seams and center of your back.  The back center of the dress has an invisible zipper, making it fit smoothly on your body.

dresses.editorial: This fancy flower girl dress in coral is for all the girly little girls out there. This gorgeous fancy coral flower girl dress is made of beautiful organza and offers a A-line style cut. It also features hand sewn sparkling sequin, beading, and embroidery throughout the bodice forming a beautiful masterpiece of floral sparkle. The sparkle from all the beading and sequin is sure to make your little flower girl look and feel like a true princess. To add to this already fabulous dress, the unique multi layered skirt boasts pleats on every other layer. This dress also comes with a matching shawl. This dashing coral flower girl dress will positively take your breath away.
